casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Vernon S. BULLOCK. No. 20P06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. January 26, 2006. Christopher W. Brooks, Assistant Attorney General, C. Colon Willoughby, Jr., District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 10th day of January 2006 by Defendant for "Petition for Discretionary Review":

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference this the 26th day of January 2006."
